org.math.plot
Class DataSelectPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.math.plot.DataSelectPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class DataSelectPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Panel designed to select a given number of columns in a multi columns matrix. Useful to provide a 3d plot view of Nd data matrix.

See Also:
Serialized Form
